data.title: Parking facilities at klia2, 6,490 covered parking bays with 24/7 security
data.meta_description: Parking facilities at klia2, 6,490 covered parking bays, fully gated and security personnel operating 24 hours for your peace of mind
data.text:
Greetings! Are you looking for information on parking facilities at klia2? You have come to the right place!

At the klia2 airport, 6,490 covered parking bays – 5,690 car bays and 800 motorcycle bays are available for the motorists.

In addition, 52 disabled-friendly driver parking bays have been reserved at every car park level at both Block A and B.

The parking facility at the klia2 is attached to the integrated complex, Gateway@klia2 mall, so it is easily accessible.

The car park is fully gated. Security personnel operates 24 hours, enabling travelers to park their vehicles overnight, or over several days, with complete peace of mind.

The management of the car park facility is a joint venture between WCT Holdings Bhd and Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd.

So, what’s the parking rates?

Parking facility at the klia2

The Gateway@klia2 mall hosts a 8-storey car park that directly adjoins the klia2 Main Terminal, emphasizing the visitors’ security and convenience as top priorities. Driving to klia2? Check out the driving guide to klia2.

The car park features surveillance cameras and security personnel operates 24 hours to ensure the security of the environment.

Upon entry, drivers can then locate vacant parking lot to park their vehicle.

The level 4 (CP4) of the 8-storey car park is connected to the level 2 of the Gateway@klia2 mall.

If you park at level 4, you can walk to the Gateway@klia2 mall directly. Otherwise, take the lift and go to level 4.

Passengers can stop at the CP4 level and walk to the Gateway@klia2 mall to access the Departure area at the klia2’s Main Terminal Building.

Customers are advised to park in the allocated space. Any vehicle parked outside the allocated space will be clamped and a surcharge of RM100.00 will be levied.

Parking for special vehicles

For motorcyclists, 800 motorcycle bays are avaialble at level 1 of the car park building. The parking rate for motorcycle is RM1.00 per entry.

In addition, 52 disabled-friendly driver parking bays have been reserved at every car park level at both Block A and B.

There are also special parking bays reserved for Hybrid cars.

The Valet Parking is available at Departure drop off area for the passengers’ convenience.

The parking rate is RM15.00 for first 2 hours on Monday to Friday, and RM15.00 for first 1 hour on Saturday to Sunday. Every subsequent hour is RM5.00 per hour.

Read more about Valet Parking.

Parking rates at the klia2

The following is a table showing the corresponding parking rates at klia2 car park effective from 1st Jan 2023.

Duration Parking rate First 1st hour to 3rd hours (or part thereof) RM5.00 per hour 4th hours to 5th hours (or part thereof) RM4.00 per hour 6th hours to 10th hours (or part thereof) RM3.00 per hour 11th hours and Above (or part thereof) RM2.00 per hour Maximum Daily Rate (1st & 2nd days) RM52.00 per day Maximum Daily Rate (3rd days onwards) RM50.00 per day Motorcycles (800 bays) RM1.00 per entry Lost Ticket RM100.00 Inclusive of 6% service tax Cheaper parking alternative

Quick Check – Daily Parking Rates 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th

★ For the latest and most updated information on the parking rates at the gateway@klia2, please kindly visit the official gatewayklia2.com.my page.

Note: If you use Touch ‘n Go card for parking, the 10% Touch ‘n Go commission fee is passed onto card users. Read more on 10% commission fee of using Touch ‘n Go card.

Payment can be made at Autopay machines on levels 1, 4 and 7. Prefer cheaper parking alternative?

The list of parking rates for the parking at the car park for the 1st to 3th days is as follow:

The list of parking rates for the parking at the car park for the 1st to 18th days is as follow:

Daily Rate No of Days Charge (RM) 1 52.00 2 104.00 3 154.00 4 204.00 5 254.00 6 304.00 7 354.00 8 404.00 9 454.00 10 504.00 11 554.00 12 604.00 13 654.00 14 704.00 15 754.00 16 804.00 17 854.00 18 904.00

The level 4 (CP4) of the car park is connected to the Level 2 of the Gateway@klia2 mall. Payment machines are available on this level.

Questions & Assistance

Payment can be made at Autopay machines on levels 1, 4 and 7 at the Gateway@klia2 mall. On Level CP4, there is a car park office located before the entrance to the Gateway@klia2 mall.

You can contact the following numbers if you need any assistance.

The proprietor of the car park does not accept responsibility for any loss of damaged howsover caused including any loss of life personal injury arising as the negligence of the proprietor or his employees, or loss or damage to the vehicle, its accessories or content. In summary, vehicles are parked at customers risk.

The level 2 of the Gateway@klia2 mall is conected to the CP4 (level 4) of the car park A and B. Following is the layout plan for car park CP4 level.

Alternative options for cheaper parking

The parking rate at the klia2 terminal is RM46 per day. If you are looking for cheaper alternatives, here are some options for your review:

1 You can consider parking your car at the Terminal Bersepadu Selatan (TBS) at Bandar Tasik Selatan which charges you RM10.00 for the first 24 hours and RM6.00 every subsequent 24 hours for parking fee.

From the Terminal Bersepadu Selatan (TBS), you can then take the KLIA Transit ERL train from the Bandar Tasik Selatan station to klia2 for RM38.40 per trip, or use the Jetbus to klia2 for RM11.00 per trip.

2 The Tune Hotel, klia2 has 167 car park bays available for public at RM2.00 per hour. 24 hour security is provided. 3 Alternatively, you can choose to park your car at Putrajaya Sentral and take the KLIA Transit train from Putrajaya & Cyberjaya ERL station to klia2 for RM9.40 per trip. The parking rate at Putrajaya Sentral starts at RM6.00 a day. 4 You can also consider parking at the Park n Ride facility at Salak Tinggi ERL station, the parking rate is RM8.00 a day. You can take the KLIA Transit ERL train from Salak Tinggi station to klia2 for RM4.90 per trip. 5 The Long Term Car Park located near Jalan KLIA1 provides free shuttle bus to the airports. The parking rate is RM2.50 for every hour or RM32.00 per day.
